messages.title: Want to give our NHS the support it needs?
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a fully costed plan to give our NHS the full investment it needs to survive. By raising tax by just one penny the Lib Dems will give our doctors and nurses £6 billion extra each year to protect our vital health services. This is your chance to change the direction of the country - and get a positive future for our NHS.

messages.title: Is this the future you want for Britain?
messages.content: "Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years" —The Mirror, 17 March 2017. "Nurses will see their pay cut by 12% over a decade" —The Observer, 30 April 2017

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raising tax by one penny to provide an extra £6 billion a year for NHS.
The Liberal Democrats will fight more cuts to the NHS and schools.

issues.education: Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years
issues.health: NHS will receive an extra £6 billion a year. Nurses will see their pay cut by 12% over a decade.

quotes.text: "Jeremy Corbyn is unfit to be called leader of the opposition"
"Labour braced for new low. Corbyn heading for disaster"

Conservative cuts to our vital services are going too far. If Theresa May wins big on 8 June they will be able to carry on with their cuts again.
